: detach does not fail when no arguments are provided
: _jsPlumb.detach should fire detach event by default
: _jsPlumb.detach should fire detach event by default, using params object
: _jsPlumb.detach should not fire detach event when instructed to not do so
: _jsPlumb.detach should fire only one detach event (pass Connection as argument)
: _jsPlumb.detach should fire only one detach event (pass Connection as param in argument)
: detach should fire only one detach event (pass source and targets as strings as arguments in params object)
: detach should fire only one detach event (pass source and targets as divs as arguments in params object)
getConnections (simple case, default scope; detach by element id using params object)
: getConnections (simple case, default scope; detach by id using params object)
: getConnections (simple case, default scope; detach by element object using params object)
: getConnections (simple case, default scope; detach by Connection)
: detach; beforeDetach on connect call returns false
: detach; beforeDetach on connect call returns undefined
: detach; beforeDetach on connect call returns true
: detach; beforeDetach on connect call throws an exception; we treat it with the contempt it deserves and pretend it said the detach was ok.
: detach; beforeDetach on addEndpoint call to source Endpoint returns false
: detach; beforeDetach on addEndpoint call to source Endpoint returns true
: Endpoint.detach; beforeDetach on addEndpoint call to source Endpoint returns false; Endpoint.detach returns false too (the UI needs it to)
: _jsPlumb.detach; beforeDetach on addEndpoint call to target Endpoint returns false
: _jsPlumb.detach; beforeDetach on addEndpoint call to target Endpoint returns false but detach is forced
: _jsPlumb.detach; beforeDetach on addEndpoint call to target Endpoint returns true
: _jsPlumb.detachAllConnections ; beforeDetach on addEndpoint call to target Endpoint returns false but we should detach anyway
: _jsPlumb.detachAllConnections ; beforeDetach on jsPlumb returns false and we dont detach
: _jsPlumb.detachAllConnections ; beforeDetach on jsPlumb returns true and we do detach
: _jsPlumb.detachEveryConnection ; beforeDetach on jsPlumb returns false and we dont detach
: _jsPlumb.detachEveryConnection ; beforeDetach on jsPlumb returns true and we do detach
: _jsPlumb.detachEveryConnection ; beforeDetach on jsPlumb returns true but we have forced detach
: _jsPlumb.detachEveryConnection ; beforeDetach on addEndpoint call to target Endpoint returns false but we should detach anyway
: Endpoint.detachAll ; beforeDetach on addEndpoint call to target Endpoint returns false but we should detach anyway
: _jsPlumb.detachEveryConnection doesn't fire events when instructed not to
: _jsPlumb.detachAllConnections doesn't fire events when instructed not to

: _jsPlumb.getConnections (filtered by a list of scopes, source ids and target ids)
